input_text:
Job Title: Lead DevOps Engineer

Location: Danvers, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
About Company:Akvelon is a known USA company, with offices in places like Seattle, Mexico, Ukraine, Poland, and Serbia. Our company is an official vendor of Microsoft and Google. Our clients also include Amazon, Evernote, Intel, HP, Reddit, Pinterest, AT&T, T-Mobile, Starbucks, and LinkedIn. To work with Akvelon means to be connected with the best and brightest engineering teams from around the globe and working with an actual technology stack building Enterprise, CRM, LOB, Cloud, AI and Machine Learning, Cross-Platform, Mobile, and other types of applications customized to client’s needs and processes.
About the Project:The purpose of this team is to be a product success team, manage surfaces in market devices.The main function of this role is to tease through all data being collected, data mining, and provide data insights. The role will consist of 40% meetings/collaboration with product owners, 50% data mining, looking at trends, completing investigations as needed, 10% miscellaneous.This is a very dynamic role with the opportunity to scale the surface business, work with consumer products, have first hand/true customer experiences and the opportunity to try to make customer’s experiences better.
Responsibilities:Drive engineering efficiency enhancements.Responsible for managing the build system, CI/CD pipeline.Laying a pivotal role in the software development process.Main focus will be on managing the migration of key DevOps infrastructure into enterprise ecosystem, integrating additional automation into critical process steps such as CI/CD.Code analysis and testing, code review, and documentation while also accounting for the security at different stages of the DevOps life cycle.
Requirements:5+ years of experience in DevOps or related fields required.Experience with CI/CD pipeline support and development using Jenkins.Experience working in a regulated industry (pharma industry, government)Experience with cloud and containerization technologiesExperience with Jenkins or related toolsExperience with at least one cloud platform (AWS/ Azure)Working experience with Gitlab, bitbucket, Jfrog , Nexus, Docker, Kubernetes, LinuxExperience with Infrastructure-as-a-Code tools like Terraform.Experience with Python and BashExperience with code repository management, code merge, and code quality checksExperience with collaboration across cross geo and diverse teams within R&D and Technology teamsExperience creating, maintaining code repositories that are part of customer facing software projects as well as troubleshooting issues during Software Development Lifecycle.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Lead DevOps Engineer
output_json.summary: Akvelon is a known USA company with offices globally and official vendor of Microsoft and Google. Working with Akvelon connects you with global engineering teams and technology stacks.
job_responsibilities: Responsible for managing the build system, CI/CD pipeline.
Laying a pivotal role in the software development process.
Main focus will be on managing the migration of key DevOps infrastructure into enterprise ecosystem, integrating additional automation into critical process steps such as CI/CD.
Code analysis and testing, code review, and documentation while also accounting for the security at different stages of the DevOps life cycle.
